title: Wilmington
headline:
Your best health,
here in Wilmington
intro: If you don’t already have a Primary Care Provider, it’s important to make an appointment and find an expert you trust to guide your health and refer you to specialty care if needed.

locationsIntro.title: Wilmington
locationsIntro.content: ChristianaCare Primary Care locations offer a variety comprehensive medical care for adults and children, with four convenient practices for our neighbors in the Wilmington area. Many locations offer appointments by video, by phone or in-office. Call for details.
